extendedInfo.description: Real Racing 2 sets the pace as the most critically-acclaimed racing simulation on Android. Speed away with hours of high-performance gameplay, cutting-edge graphics, and intuitive controls. Experience the excitement, competition, and glory of authentic championship racing with Real Racing 2!** Real Racing 2 is an immersive racing experience that requires a 350+ MB download. We strongly recommend connecting to WiFi before downloading. We promise â itâs worth it! **THE CRITICS ARE BLOWN AWAYâReal Racing 2 ups the ante from the previous version with absolutely insane visuals for Android devices, delivering ultra realistic environments and shiny car models.â (Phandroid) âReal Racing set the standard for just how good racing games could look on smartphones and its sequel managed to push the quality of its graphics even further.â (Trusted Reviews)BURN RUBBER ON ANDROID!â¢ Test your racing prowess on a 16 car grid against highly skilled AI drivers.â¢ Select from 30 officially licensed cars including the 2010 Ford Shelby Mustang GT500, 2010 Nissan GT-R (R35), 2012 McLaren MP4-12C, and more!â¢ Work your way from rookie to pro in a robust Career Mode, offering 10 hours of exhilarating gameplay. Jump into a Quick Race for instant fun â or try to beat the clock in Time Trial Mode. â¢ Race in 15 beautiful locations, with 40 miles of highly detailed race tracks, speedways, and city circuits â including twilight and night races.â¢ Touch or tilt to steer, as you experience state-of-the-art handling with customizable options that tailor to your personal driving style. â¢ Experience the intensity of head-to-head racing with 5 unique camera angles and breath-taking graphics powered by Firemintâs exclusive high performance Mint3Dâ¢ engine.Ready to race? Buckle in, start your engine, and speed away with REAL RACING 2!Be the first to know! Get inside EA info on great deals, plus the latest game updates, tips & moreâ¦VISIT US: eamobile.com/androidFOLLOW US: twitter.com/eamobileLIKE US: facebook.com/eamobileWATCH US: youtube.com/eamobilegamesCheck out more exciting games from EA like The Sims FreePlay, Need for Speed Most Wanted, Theme Park, World Series of Poker, and FIFA 12!For more information about the third party targeted ad serving and analytics technology in this app and data they collect, see End User License Agreement:http://tos.ea.com/legalapp/mobileeula/US/en/GM/

reviews.title: HTC evo V 4 G
reviews.comment: Pros: Best droid racing game so far Good graphics  Cons: Not many cars to choose Not many tracks
reviews.author: Guillermo Martinez

reviews.title: Addicting
reviews.comment: After getting tired of real racing 3, I thought I\'d try the older version. Graphics not as good but game play is great. Very fun game and worth every penny.
reviews.author: David Allston

reviews.comment: I really like this game. I started off playing Real Racing 3 which I love, and decided to give this one a shot. Enjoying it so far. Check it out.
reviews.author: Justin Breault

reviews.title: Better than real racing 3!
reviews.comment: It\'s great not worrying about micro transactions for once, but it has no multiplayer which is pretty messed up considering the iPhone/touch/pad version has it. Runs really smooth on the SG S3.
reviews.author: Steve Patheal

reviews.title: Can\'t ask for more. Grab the wheel\'s and speed off.
reviews.comment: The best out there. And excellent product. Well though of, very realistic and response.  The more you put into it, the better it gets. Can\'t wait to have RR 3 release on Android.
reviews.author: Adeola Bamgboye

reviews.title: Really well put together
reviews.comment: Smooth game play and realistic controls! A game would have to be my wife to gain a perfect five stars! Hills!
reviews.author: Damien McGhee

reviews.title: Pretty Cool!
reviews.comment: Good game, no in app purchases so that is a huge +! Support has been dropped though because of the RR3 fremium cash cow. F*** THOSE FREMIUM GAMES :( 1 star because I just LOATHE EA.
reviews.author: cory cook

reviews.title: Beautiful, but forecloses...
reviews.comment: It started great and the graphics blew me away, then it foreclosed and the fun was short-lived... Galaxy note on jelly bean... Five stars when fixed Update: I moved the game to my sd card, it\'s much more stable now but still forecloses later on in the game...  Update: it\'s completely unplayable now...disappointed.
reviews.author: serge roso

reviews.title: It\'s awesome!
reviews.comment: Would put 5 stars if we had multi-player but otherwis worth your money. Very high quality.
reviews.author: Tyler K

reviews.title: I\'m impressed EA
reviews.comment: This is an amazing game EA. Great graphics, scenery, and cars. But why is there only multiplayer for iOS that\'s my only complaint. Thanks for the great game. :-)  And please put multiplayer in the next update.
reviews.author: Daniel Esbenshade

reviews.title: More cars
reviews.comment: Could use more cars..but pretty good game play once you get used to it
reviews.author: Josh McDonald

reviews.title: Very well made
reviews.comment: Awesome so fun and a good time killer
reviews.author: Juan Carlos Ruiz

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Great easy to play fun and intuitive... Awesome Game????? Great job
reviews.author: tradairius kirby

reviews.title: Good but needs improvement
reviews.comment: Generally the game plays well on my SGS3. However the driving \"feel\" and \"physics\" are not as refine as playing Real Racing 2 on iOS version.
reviews.author: Raymond Chia

reviews.title: Bravo
reviews.comment: The game is great, no lag at all or any problems. I kind of like that when you hit places of your car, parts of your car break off. The cars are also very nice. I dont think there should be more cars since it would be too many. Everything to me is perfect. Thanks for a great game. Wish real racing 3 was compatible with my phone Coolpad Quattro 4G
reviews.author: Mevren Camili

reviews.title: Minor performance issue
reviews.comment: Stutters a bit while using the default camera view (steering).
reviews.author: Harris Hakim

reviews.title: Great experience in the palms of my hands......
reviews.comment: I play forza Motorsport with a wheel and have always loved racing games. And to have this in a portable package is unbelievable. If you love racing and don\'t want a cheesy arcade game, I strongly recommend you try this one. And I can\'t wait to see if there will be a third edition in the future.
reviews.author: CJ Camp

reviews.title: Hands down, The Absolute
reviews.comment: Best racing Game on the Market!!!!  Ive just started over again cause i got a new phone. Refurbished SIII runs flawlessly. Playing pro setting with nothing on and im white knuckling it on the couch!!!  And its free?  Wow!  Keep up the good work.  How bout some new tracks??  New Cars?? Maybe some moutainous or better yet , how bout a couple of rally tracks.
reviews.author: Doug Reid

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Amazing graphics. Lots of fun. Great time waster.
reviews.author: Eric Ernst

reviews.title: Great sim, games a little weak though
reviews.comment: As far as racing simulator, this is the best I\'ve found on android. However, when you compare the game play to things like asphalt n NFS, its slightly lacking in fun factor. If your looking for goofy chases n absurd modifications look elsewhere. If you want a true racing sim on your phone is this is
reviews.author: Andrew Lucci
